shortdesc.ph: Sets the formant ratio to change the voice timbre.
Sets the formant ratio to change the vocal timbre.

section.p: The formant ratio affects the timbre of the voice. A smaller value results in a deeper voice; a larger value results in a sharper voice. To change both timbre and pitch, it is recommended to use and together.

The formant ratio affects the timbre of the voice. The smaller the value, the deeper the voice; the larger the value, the sharper the voice. If you want to change both timbre and pitch, it is recommended to use and together.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: You can call this method to set the formant ratio of the local audio to change the voice timbre.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.

plentry.pd: Formant ratio. The range is [-1.0, 1.0]. Default is 0.0, which means no change to timbre. It is recommended to set this value within the range [-0.4, 0.6], otherwise the voice may be seriously distorted.
Formant ratio. Value range is [-1.0, 1.0]. (Default is 0.0) It is recommended to set this value within the range [-0.4, 0.6], otherwise the sound may be severely distorted.
